languages.text: "Наши зенитные расчеты не могут поразить их. Снаряды оснащены средствами ослепления авгуров и маневровыми двигателями для уклонения от огня. Советую Вашей Светлости приготовиться к бою — импакт с торпедой-лидером произойдет на одну палубу ниже капитанского мостика".

"Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."
languages.original_text: "Наши зенитные расчеты не могут поразить их. Снаряды оснащены средствами ослепления авгуров и маневровыми двигателями для уклонения от огня. Советую Вашей Светлости приготовиться к бою — импакт с торпедой-лидером произойдет на одну палубу ниже капитанского мостика".

traits.locale_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — the collision with the leading torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — the collision with the leading torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Notre équipe des contre-mesures ne peut rien contre elles. Ces projectiles sont équipés de dispositifs de brouillage des augures, ainsi que de propulseurs directionnels qui leur permettent d'éviter les tirs. Votre Seigneurie, je vous recommande de vous préparer au combat ; la torpille de tête frappera le vaisseau au niveau du pont situé directement sous la passerelle. »
languages.original_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Notre équipe des contre-mesures ne peut rien contre elles. Ces projectiles sont équipés de dispositifs de brouillage des augures, ainsi que de propulseurs directionnels qui leur permettent d'éviter les tirs. Votre Seigneurie, je vous recommande de vous préparer au combat ; la torpille de tête frappera le vaisseau au niveau du pont situé directement sous la passerelle. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “我们的拦截人员无法拦截鱼雷。这些鱼雷配备了俄歇矩阵致盲反导装置和转向推进器，可以躲避定点射击。我建议大人您做好战斗准备，鱼雷恐怕会集中在舰桥下层的甲板。”
languages.original_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

traits.locale_text: “我们的拦截人员无法拦截鱼雷。这些鱼雷配备了俄歇矩阵致盲反导装置和转向推进器，可以躲避定点射击。我建议大人您做好战斗准备，鱼雷恐怕会集中在舰桥下层的甲板。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Unsere Anti-Leere-Crews können sie nicht treffen. Diese Projektile sind mit Gegenmaßnahmen ausgestattet, die unsere Auguren blenden, außerdem besitzen sie Schubdüsen, um Lenkgeschossen zu entgehen. Ich rate Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, sich auf einen Kampf einzustellen. Die Kollision mit dem ersten Torpedo wird ein Deck unter der Brücke erwartet."
languages.original_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Anti-Leere-Crews können sie nicht treffen. Diese Projektile sind mit Gegenmaßnahmen ausgestattet, die unsere Auguren blenden, außerdem besitzen sie Schubdüsen, um Lenkgeschossen zu entgehen. Ich rate Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, sich auf einen Kampf einzustellen. Die Kollision mit dem ersten Torpedo wird ein Deck unter der Brücke erwartet."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Nuestro personal antivacío no puede atacarlos. Esos proyectiles tienen medidas para cegar a los augures y propulsores de dirección para evitar disparos. {mf|Milord|Milady}, le aconsejo que se prepare para combatir; el torpedo principal va dirigido a la cubierta que hay debajo del puente».
languages.original_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro personal antivacío no puede atacarlos. Esos proyectiles tienen medidas para cegar a los augures y propulsores de dirección para evitar disparos. {mf|Milord|Milady}, le aconsejo que se prepare para combatir; el torpedo principal va dirigido a la cubierta que hay debajo del puente».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「こちらの対ヴォイドクルーでは命中させられません。ああいった発射体にはスキャナー目眩し対策と操縦スラスターを備えて、標的からの攻撃を回避できるようになっています。陛下、どうか戦闘に備えてください…魚雷の先端部分とブリッジ下のデッキが衝突しますよ」
languages.original_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「こちらの対ヴォイドクルーでは命中させられません。ああいった発射体にはスキャナー目眩し対策と操縦スラスターを備えて、標的からの攻撃を回避できるようになっています。陛下、どうか戦闘に備えてください…魚雷の先端部分とブリッジ下のデッキが衝突しますよ」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Uçsuz karşıtı mürettebatımız torpidoları vuramaz. Bu silahların alamet körelten önlemleri ve güdümlü saldırılardan kaçınmalarını sağlayan iticileri var. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne çatışmaya hazırlanmalarını tavsiye ederim. İlk torpido, köprünün bir altındaki güverteye çarpacak."
languages.original_text: "Our anti-void crews cannot hit them. These projectiles are equipped with augur-blinding countermeasures and steering thrusters to evade targeted fire. I advise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to prepare for battle — collision with the head torpedo will take place one deck below the bridge."
